name: zkRace
description: zkRace front-running Web3 horse racing game powered by ZERC zkRace as a game is a combination of 2 significantly growing multi-billion-dollar markets: video gaming, and horse racing, all merged by blockchain and NFT technologies. Player-centered, zkRace ensures a tailored gaming experience, actively working on meeting player in-game needs. Pioneered by zkRace. Powered by ZERC. Tailored for GameFi and beyond.
